data.eml:eml: Pelocoris balius La Rivers (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Naucoridae) in Florida: New Status of an Enigmatic Saucer Bug

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sites, Robert W. (2015): Pelocoris balius La Rivers (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Naucoridae) in Florida: New Status of an Enigmatic Saucer Bug. Zootaxa 3915 (3): 433-438, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3915.3.8
